Key Match Events: The Rockets built a 25-point lead by halftime
The Spurs didn't get closer than 10 points after the 7-0 run by the Rockets
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Rockets dominated inside, outscoring the Spurs 66-46 in the paint
Others: Jeremy Sochan, top on-ball defender for the Spurs, was out due to a fractured left thumb
